name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Analyst Engineer with a robust background in **AI**, **DataAnalytics**, and **DecisionIntelligence**, leveraging 13+ years of experience in technology-driven industries, particularly healthcare and finance. Expertise in **GraphAnalytics** and **AIDataEngineering**, applying advanced analytics solutions to derive actionable insights. Proficient in implementing and advising on **TechnicalAnalysis**, with a strong ability to deliver tailored recommendations that drive business decisions.
Demonstrated skills in **ResearchWriting** and **PresentationSkills** to articulate complex concepts clearly, facilitating effective **ClientEngagement**. A collaborative team player dedicated to fostering **ThoughtLeadership**, mentoring peers, and enabling organizational growth through enhanced **Collaboration** and strong **OrganizationalSkills**. Experienced in addressing compliance needs and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while building scalable applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** within dynamic frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Conducted in-depth **DataAnalytics** to derive insights from health and finance data, using advanced tools like PostgreSQL and MongoDB supported by real-time analytics frameworks.
• Provided **ImplementationAdvice** on the integration of **AI** models for risk scoring and fraud detection using scikit-learn and TensorFlow, enhancing decision-making processes across departments.
• Developed automated reporting and visualization solutions using **GraphAnalytics** with D3.js and Power BI Embedded, delivering actionable insights to stakeholders.
• Led research initiatives and wrote detailed reports on the latest trends in **DecisionIntelligence** and **AIDataEngineering**, influencing strategic direction and innovation in projects.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement **LLMs** (Large Language Models) for document parsing, utilizing spaCy and Hugging Face Transformers to streamline workflows.
• Mentored junior engineers and analysts, fostering a culture of knowledge-sharing and continuous improvement within the team while enhancing **OrganizationalSkills**.
• Engaged with clients to deliver tailored solutions, effectively communicating technical concepts through strong **PresentationSkills** and fostering strong **ClientEngagement**.
• Ensured robust testing strategies were in place for all developed systems through the use of **TechnicalAnalysis** methods and tools like Jest, Cypress, and PyTest, covering over **95%** code coverage across multiple projects.
• Developed and optimized **RAG** (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipelines for efficient data processing and model deployment, achieving a **30%** reduction in processing time.
• Drove collaboration between data engineering and analytics teams to enhance **AnalyticsEngineering** processes, streamlining model validation and deployment with **MLOps** tools such as MLflow and Airflow.
• Integrated intelligent features into applications, leveraging Azure ML and AWS Sagemaker to enhance user experiences with real-time predictive alerts, contributing to a **15%** increase in customer engagement.

• Leveraged **DataAnalytics** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for **high-volume** transactional systems.
• Implemented **AI** techniques in building real-time analytics dashboards with **React (18)**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with **instant insights** into transactions and anomalies.
• Collaborated on designing an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance, affecting **over 100,000 transactions daily**.
• Developed and optimized **ETL pipelines** for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time processing to handle data volumes exceeding **5 terabytes monthly**.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activities based on user behavior and transaction patterns, resulting in a **30% reduction in false positives**.
• Created performing **ML pipelines** for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services seamlessly, with the goal of increasing efficiency by **25%**.
• Engaged in **client engagement** and **presentation** roles, showcasing analytical findings and providing **implementation advice** to stakeholders to facilitate informed decision-making.

• Applied **AI** and **Data Analytics** techniques to personalize user experiences and enhance product offerings, driving significant improvements in conversion rates.
• Conducted **Technical Analysis** for backend systems, focusing on scalability and performance optimization, yielding a **30%** reduction in load times for critical services.
• Provided **Implementation Advice** based on real-time data insights and analytics, leading to the successful integration of new features that align with user behavior patterns.
• Engaged in **Client Engagement** initiatives, presenting findings and strategies to stakeholders to foster alignment and support for data-driven decisions.
• Demonstrated **Thought Leadership** by researching and adopting innovative solutions, leveraging **LLMs** and **Graph Analytics** to drive data strategies that align with business objectives.
• Collaborated across teams to enhance **Analytics Engineering** capabilities, developing robust data pipelines that improved data accessibility and usability for the organization.
• Mentored team members on data best practices and provided **Research Writing** support for technical documentation and project reports, elevating knowledge sharing within the organization.
• Maintained consistent **Collaboration** with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of data strategies with organizational goals and technical implementations.
• Enhanced organizational workflows through improved **Organizational Skills**, leading project management strategies that adhered to timelines and quality standards.
